Subject: Re: The Old Maximal Base/Unicron's come back
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=180614363; y=9uwsneUfz-fdOLbWEdU4vqvsVgaFcVZFHHJdXwufPkKrt6ItjDHpMg

As the Maximals and Autobot were working on repairs and exploration , the dark form of Legacy slid into the skies above as he arrived in his military satellite mode. Heavily armored and seemingly bristling cannon mounts as well as communications gear, it appeared that he could act both as a communications and observation station as well as an orbital cannon. 

Acting in the former capacity, Legacy's powerful scans hit the old Maximal base, attempting to penetrate it and discern what is going on within even as he once again opened communications, "This is unit Legacy, I have arrived at your location. Initial scans indicate some structural damage as well as loss of power. I am detecting, in addition to Maximal and a lone Autobot energy signature, at least one Minion energy signature and a possible second which at the moment is more elusive."

Legacy assumed a parked position in the air above the base as he continued, "How may I be of assistance?"

<TAG>

Preston
(Legacy)
